prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a jellyfish appearance and vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a floating creature with long tentacles and a blue body.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon design featuring a smooth blue surface and red accents.
Make a whimsical jellyfish-inspired Pokemon with unique features and a playful expression.
Imagine a small Pokemon that swims gracefully through the water, resembling Tentacool.
Design an underwater Pokemon with a striking color palette and distinctive tentacle-like appendages.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body and a mix of blue and red colors.
